title: Define Overall Project Scope and Objectives
description: Develop a clear understanding of the project's purpose, goals, and expected outcomes.

title: Research and Gather Existing Solutions in Automated Production Chains
description: Investigate existing automated production chains to identify best practices and potential solutions for our project, focusing on optimizing efficiency, reducing costs, and integrating robots. Document findings in a clear and concise manner.
dependencies: Define Overall Project Scope and Objectives

title: Design Architecture for the Automated Production Chain
description: Create a high-level design of the automated production chain, including integration with existing systems.
dependencies: Research and Gather Existing Solutions in Automated Production Chains

title: Develop Frontend Interface for User Interaction
description: Design and implement the frontend interface to control and monitor the automated production chain.
dependencies: Define Overall Project Scope and Objectives
Design Architecture for the Automated Production Chain

title: Develop Backend Services for Data Processing
description: Implement the backend services to handle data processing tasks for the automated production chain.
dependencies: Define Overall Project Scope and Objectives
Design Architecture for the Automated Production Chain

title: Integrate Robot Systems into the Automated Production Chain
description: Identify suitable robots, integrate them with the automated production chain, and ensure proper functionality.
dependencies: Define Overall Project Scope and Objectives
Design Architecture for the Automated Production Chain

title: Test and Validate the Automated Production Chain
description: Conduct thorough testing of the automated production chain to ensure it meets its objectives.
dependencies: Develop Frontend Interface for User Interaction
Develop Backend Services for Data Processing
Integrate Robot Systems into the Automated Production Chain

title: Implement DevOps Practices for Continuous Integration and Deployment
description: Set up DevOps practices to ensure smooth deployment, scaling, and maintenance of the automated production chain.
dependencies: Develop Frontend Interface for User Interaction
Develop Backend Services for Data Processing
Integrate Robot Systems into the Automated Production Chain
